line: Could have attain'd the effect of your own purpose,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Whether you had not sometime in your life

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Err'd in this point which now you censure him,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: And pull'd the law upon you.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: 'Tis one thing to be tempted, Escalus,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Another thing to fall. I not deny,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: The jury, passing on the prisoner's life,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: May in the sworn twelve have a thief or two

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Guiltier than him they try. What's open made to justice,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: That justice seizes: what know the laws

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: That thieves do pass on thieves? 'Tis very pregnant,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: The jewel that we find, we stoop and take't

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Because we see it; but what we do not see

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: We tread upon, and never think of it.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: You may not so extenuate his offence

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: For I have had such faults; but rather tell me,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: When I, that censure him, do so offend,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Let mine own judgment pattern out my death,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: And nothing come in partial. Sir, he must die.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Be it as your wisdom will.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Where is the provost?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: Provost
line: Here, if it like your honour.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: See that Claudio

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Be executed by nine to-morrow morning:

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Bring him his confessor, let him be prepared;

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: For that's the utmost of his pilgrimage.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Aside  Well, heaven forgive him! and forgive us all!

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Some rise by sin, and some by virtue fall:

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Some run from brakes of ice, and answer none:

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: And some condemned for a fault alone.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: Come, bring them away: if these be good people in

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: a commonweal that do nothing but use their abuses in

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: common houses, I know no law: bring them away.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: How now, sir! What's your name? and what's the matter?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: If it Please your honour, I am the poor duke's

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: constable, and my name is Elbow: I do lean upon

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: justice, sir, and do bring in here before your good

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: honour two notorious benefactors.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Benefactors? Well; what benefactors are they? are

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: they not malefactors?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: If it? please your honour, I know not well what they

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: are: but precise villains they are, that I am sure

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: of; and void of all profanation in the world that

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: good Christians ought to have.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: This comes off well; here's a wise officer.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Go to: what quality are they of? Elbow is your

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: name? why dost thou not speak, Elbow?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: He cannot, sir; he's out at elbow.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: What are you, sir?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: He, sir! a tapster, sir; parcel-bawd; one that

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: serves a bad woman; whose house, sir, was, as they

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: say, plucked down in the suburbs; and now she

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: professes a hot-house, which, I think, is a very ill house too.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: How know you that?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: My wife, sir, whom I detest before heaven and your honour,--

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: How? thy wife?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: Ay, sir; whom, I thank heaven, is an honest woman,--

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Dost thou detest her therefore?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: I say, sir, I will detest myself also, as well as

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: she, that this house, if it be not a bawd's house,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: it is pity of her life, for it is a naughty house.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: How dost thou know that, constable?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: Marry, sir, by my wife; who, if she had been a woman

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: cardinally given, might have been accused in

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: fornication, adultery, and all uncleanliness there.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: By the woman's means?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: Ay, sir, by Mistress Overdone's means: but as she

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: spit in his face, so she defied him.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Sir, if it please your honour, this is not so.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: Prove it before these varlets here, thou honourable

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: man; prove it.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Do you hear how he misplaces?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Sir, she came in great with child; and longing,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: saving your honour's reverence, for stewed prunes;

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: sir, we had but two in the house, which at that very

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: distant time stood, as it were, in a fruit-dish, a

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: dish of some three-pence; your honours have seen

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: such dishes; they are not China dishes, but very

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: good dishes,--

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Go to, go to: no matter for the dish, sir.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: No, indeed, sir, not of a pin; you are therein in

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: the right: but to the point. As I say, this

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Mistress Elbow, being, as I say, with child, and

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: being great-bellied, and longing, as I said, for

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: prunes; and having but two in the dish, as I said,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Master Froth here, this very man, having eaten the

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: rest, as I said, and, as I say, paying for them very

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: honestly; for, as you know, Master Froth, I could

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: not give you three-pence again.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: FROTH
line: No, indeed.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Very well: you being then, if you be remembered,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: cracking the stones of the foresaid prunes,--

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: FROTH
line: Ay, so I did indeed.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Why, very well; I telling you then, if you be

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: remembered, that such a one and such a one were past

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: cure of the thing you wot of, unless they kept very

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: good diet, as I told you,--

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: FROTH
line: All this is true.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Why, very well, then,--

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Come, you are a tedious fool: to the purpose. What

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: was done to Elbow's wife, that he hath cause to

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: complain of? Come me to what was done to her.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Sir, your honour cannot come to that yet.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: No, sir, nor I mean it not.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Sir, but you shall come to it, by your honour's

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: leave. And, I beseech you, look into Master Froth

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: here, sir; a man of four-score pound a year; whose

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: father died at Hallowmas: was't not at Hallowmas,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Master Froth?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: FROTH
line: All-hallond eve.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Why, very well; I hope here be truths. He, sir,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: sitting, as I say, in a lower chair, sir; 'twas in

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: the Bunch of Grapes, where indeed you have a delight

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: to sit, have you not?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: FROTH
line: I have so; because it is an open room and good for winter.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Why, very well, then; I hope here be truths.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: This will last out a night in Russia,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: When nights are longest there: I'll take my leave.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: And leave you to the hearing of the cause;

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Hoping you'll find good cause to whip them all.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: I think no less. Good morrow to your lordship.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Now, sir, come on: what was done to Elbow's wife, once more?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Once, sir? there was nothing done to her once.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: I beseech you, sir, ask him what this man did to my wife.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: I beseech your honour, ask me.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Well, sir; what did this gentleman to her?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: I beseech you, sir, look in this gentleman's face.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Good Master Froth, look upon his honour; 'tis for a

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: good purpose. Doth your honour mark his face?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Ay, sir, very well.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Nay; I beseech you, mark it well.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Well, I do so.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Doth your honour see any harm in his face?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Why, no.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: I'll be supposed upon a book, his face is the worst

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: thing about him. Good, then; if his face be the

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: worst thing about him, how could Master Froth do the

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: constable's wife any harm? I would know that of

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: your honour.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: He's in the right. Constable, what say you to it?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: First, an it like you, the house is a respected

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: house; next, this is a respected fellow; and his

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: mistress is a respected woman.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: By this hand, sir, his wife is a more respected

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: person than any of us all.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: Varlet, thou liest; thou liest, wicked varlet! the

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: time has yet to come that she was ever respected

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: with man, woman, or child.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Sir, she was respected with him before he married with her.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Which is the wiser here? Justice or Iniquity? Is

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: this true?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: O thou caitiff! O thou varlet! O thou wicked

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: Hannibal! I respected with her before I was married

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: to her! If ever I was respected with her, or she

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: with me, let not your worship think me the poor

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: duke's officer. Prove this, thou wicked Hannibal, or

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: I'll have mine action of battery on thee.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: If he took you a box o' the ear, you might have your

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: action of slander too.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: Marry, I thank your good worship for it. What is't

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: your worship's pleasure I shall do with this wicked caitiff?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Truly, officer, because he hath some offences in him

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: that thou wouldst discover if thou couldst, let him

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: continue in his courses till thou knowest what they

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: are.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: Marry, I thank your worship for it. Thou seest, thou

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: wicked varlet, now, what's come upon thee: thou art

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: to continue now, thou varlet; thou art to continue.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Where were you born, friend?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: FROTH
line: Here in Vienna, sir.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Are you of fourscore pounds a year?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: FROTH
line: Yes, an't please you, sir.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: So. What trade are you of, sir?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPHEY
line: Tapster; a poor widow's tapster.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Your mistress' name?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPHEY
line: Mistress Overdone.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Hath she had any more than one husband?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Nine, sir; Overdone by the last.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Nine! Come hither to me, Master Froth. Master

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Froth, I would not have you acquainted with

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: tapsters: they will draw you, Master Froth, and you

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: will hang them. Get you gone, and let me hear no

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: more of you.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: FROTH
line: I thank your worship. For mine own part, I never

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: FROTH
line: come into any room in a tap-house, but I am drawn

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: FROTH
line: in.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Well, no more of it, Master Froth: farewell.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Come you hither to me, Master tapster. What's your

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: name, Master tapster?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Pompey.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: What else?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Bum, sir.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Troth, and your bum is the greatest thing about you;

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: so that in the beastliest sense you are Pompey the

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Great. Pompey, you are partly a bawd, Pompey,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: howsoever you colour it in being a tapster, are you

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: not? come, tell me true: it shall be the better for you.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Truly, sir, I am a poor fellow that would live.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: How would you live, Pompey? by being a bawd? What

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: do you think of the trade, Pompey? is it a lawful trade?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: If the law would allow it, sir.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: But the law will not allow it, Pompey; nor it shall

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: not be allowed in Vienna.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Does your worship mean to geld and splay all the

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: youth of the city?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: No, Pompey.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Truly, sir, in my poor opinion, they will to't then.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: If your worship will take order for the drabs and

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: the knaves, you need not to fear the bawds.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: There are pretty orders beginning, I can tell you:

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: it is but heading and hanging.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: If you head and hang all that offend that way but

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: for ten year together, you'll be glad to give out a

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: commission for more heads: if this law hold in

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Vienna ten year, I'll rent the fairest house in it

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: after three-pence a bay: if you live to see this

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: come to pass, say Pompey told you so.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Thank you, good Pompey; and, in requital of your

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: prophecy, hark you: I advise you, let me not find

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: you before me again upon any complaint whatsoever;

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: no, not for dwelling where you do: if I do, Pompey,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: I shall beat you to your tent, and prove a shrewd

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Caesar to you; in plain dealing, Pompey, I shall

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: have you whipt: so, for this time, Pompey, fare you well.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: I thank your worship for your good counsel:

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: but I shall follow it as the flesh and fortune shall

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: better determine.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: Whip me? No, no; let carman whip his jade:

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: POMPEY
line: The valiant heart is not whipt out of his trade.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Come hither to me, Master Elbow; come hither, Master

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: constable. How long have you been in this place of constable?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: Seven year and a half, sir.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: I thought, by your readiness in the office, you had

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: continued in it some time. You say, seven years together?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: And a half, sir.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Alas, it hath been great pains to you. They do you

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: wrong to put you so oft upon 't: are there not men

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: in your ward sufficient to serve it?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: Faith, sir, few of any wit in such matters: as they

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: are chosen, they are glad to choose me for them; I

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: do it for some piece of money, and go through with

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: all.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Look you bring me in the names of some six or seven,

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: the most sufficient of your parish.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ELBOW
line: To your worship's house, sir?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: To my house. Fare you well.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: What's o'clock, think you?

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: Justice
line: Eleven, sir.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: I pray you home to dinner with me.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: Justice
line: I humbly thank you.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: It grieves me for the death of Claudio;

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: But there's no remedy.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: Justice
line: Lord Angelo is severe.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: It is but needful:

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Mercy is not itself, that oft looks so;

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Pardon is still the nurse of second woe:

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: But yet,--poor Claudio! There is no remedy.

scene: SCENE I.  A hall In ANGELO's house.
speaker: ESCALUS
line: Come, sir.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Servant
line: He's hearing of a cause; he will come straight

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Servant
line: I'll tell him of you.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: Pray you, do.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: I'll know

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: His pleasure; may be he will relent. Alas,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: He hath but as offended in a dream!

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: All sects, all ages smack of this vice; and he

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: To die for't!

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Now, what's the matter. Provost?

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: Is it your will Claudio shall die tomorrow?

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Did not I tell thee yea? hadst thou not order?

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Why dost thou ask again?

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: Lest I might be too rash:

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: Under your good correction, I have seen,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: When, after execution, judgment hath

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: Repented o'er his doom.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Go to; let that be mine:

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Do you your office, or give up your place,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: And you shall well be spared.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: I crave your honour's pardon.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: What shall be done, sir, with the groaning Juliet?

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: She's very near her hour.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Dispose of her

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: To some more fitter place, and that with speed.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Servant
line: Here is the sister of the man condemn'd

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Servant
line: Desires access to you.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Hath he a sister?

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: Ay, my good lord; a very virtuous maid,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: And to be shortly of a sisterhood,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: If not already.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Well, let her be admitted.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: See you the fornicatress be removed:

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Let have needful, but not lavish, means;

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: There shall be order for't.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: God save your honour!

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Stay a little while.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: You're welcome: what's your will?

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: I am a woeful suitor to your honour,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Please but your honour hear me.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Well; what's your suit?

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: There is a vice that most I do abhor,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: And most desire should meet the blow of justice;

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: For which I would not plead, but that I must;

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: For which I must not plead, but that I am

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: At war 'twixt will and will not.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Well; the matter?

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: I have a brother is condemn'd to die:

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: I do beseech you, let it be his fault,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: And not my brother.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: Provost
line: Aside  Heaven give thee moving graces!

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Condemn the fault and not the actor of it?

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Why, every fault's condemn'd ere it be done:

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Mine were the very cipher of a function,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: To fine the faults whose fine stands in record,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: And let go by the actor.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: O just but severe law!

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: I had a brother, then. Heaven keep your honour!

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: LUCIO
line: Aside to ISABELLA  Give't not o'er so: to him

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: LUCIO
line: again, entreat him;

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: LUCIO
line: Kneel down before him, hang upon his gown:

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: LUCIO
line: You are too cold; if you should need a pin,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: LUCIO
line: You could not with more tame a tongue desire it:

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: LUCIO
line: To him, I say!

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Must he needs die?

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Maiden, no remedy.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Yes; I do think that you might pardon him,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: And neither heaven nor man grieve at the mercy.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: I will not do't.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: But can you, if you would?

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Look, what I will not, that I cannot do.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: But might you do't, and do the world no wrong,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: If so your heart were touch'd with that remorse

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: As mine is to him?

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: He's sentenced; 'tis too late.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: LUCIO
line: Aside to ISABELLA  You are too cold.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Too late? why, no; I, that do speak a word.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: May call it back again. Well, believe this,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: No ceremony that to great ones 'longs,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Not the king's crown, nor the deputed sword,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: The marshal's truncheon, nor the judge's robe,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Become them with one half so good a grace

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: As mercy does.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: If he had been as you and you as he,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: You would have slipt like him; but he, like you,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Would not have been so stern.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Pray you, be gone.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: I would to heaven I had your potency,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: And you were Isabel! should it then be thus?

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: No; I would tell what 'twere to be a judge,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: And what a prisoner.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: LUCIO
line: Aside to ISABELLA

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: LUCIO
line: Ay, touch him; there's the vein.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Your brother is a forfeit of the law,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: And you but waste your words.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Alas, alas!

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Why, all the souls that were were forfeit once;

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: And He that might the vantage best have took

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Found out the remedy. How would you be,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: If He, which is the top of judgment, should

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: But judge you as you are? O, think on that;

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: And mercy then will breathe within your lips,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Like man new made.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Be you content, fair maid;

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: It is the law, not I condemn your brother:

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Were he my kinsman, brother, or my son,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: It should be thus with him: he must die tomorrow.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: To-morrow! O, that's sudden! Spare him, spare him!

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: He's not prepared for death. Even for our kitchens

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: We kill the fowl of season: shall we serve heaven

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: With less respect than we do minister

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: To our gross selves? Good, good my lord, bethink you;

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Who is it that hath died for this offence?

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: There's many have committed it.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: LUCIO
line: Aside to ISABELLA           Ay, well said.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: The law hath not been dead, though it hath slept:

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Those many had not dared to do that evil,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: If the first that did the edict infringe

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Had answer'd for his deed: now 'tis awake

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Takes note of what is done; and, like a prophet,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Looks in a glass, that shows what future evils,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Either new, or by remissness new-conceived,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: And so in progress to be hatch'd and born,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Are now to have no successive degrees,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: But, ere they live, to end.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Yet show some pity.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: I show it most of all when I show justice;

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: For then I pity those I do not know,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Which a dismiss'd offence would after gall;

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: And do him right that, answering one foul wrong,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Lives not to act another. Be satisfied;

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Your brother dies to-morrow; be content.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: So you must be the first that gives this sentence,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: And he, that suffer's. O, it is excellent

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: To have a giant's strength; but it is tyrannous

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: To use it like a giant.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: LUCIO
line: Aside to ISABELLA   That's well said.

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Could great men thunder

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: As Jove himself does, Jove would ne'er be quiet,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: For every pelting, petty officer

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Would use his heaven for thunder;

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Nothing but thunder! Merciful Heaven,

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Thou rather with thy sharp and sulphurous bolt

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Split'st the unwedgeable and gnarled oak

scene: SCENE II.  Another room in the same.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Your sense pursues not mine: either you are ignorant,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Or seem so craftily; and that's not good.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Let me be ignorant, and in nothing good,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: But graciously to know I am no better.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Thus wisdom wishes to appear most bright

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: When it doth tax itself; as these black masks

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Proclaim an enshield beauty ten times louder

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Than beauty could, display'd. But mark me;

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: To be received plain, I'll speak more gross:

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Your brother is to die.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: So.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: And his offence is so, as it appears,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Accountant to the law upon that pain.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: True.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Admit no other way to save his life,--

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: As I subscribe not that, nor any other,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: But in the loss of question,--that you, his sister,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Finding yourself desired of such a person,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Whose credit with the judge, or own great place,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Could fetch your brother from the manacles

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Of the all-building law; and that there were

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: No earthly mean to save him, but that either

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: You must lay down the treasures of your body

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: To this supposed, or else to let him suffer;

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: What would you do?

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: As much for my poor brother as myself:

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: That is, were I under the terms of death,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: The impression of keen whips I'ld wear as rubies,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: And strip myself to death, as to a bed

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: That longing have been sick for, ere I'ld yield

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: My body up to shame.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Then must your brother die.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: And 'twere the cheaper way:

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Better it were a brother died at once,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Than that a sister, by redeeming him,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Should die for ever.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Were not you then as cruel as the sentence

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: That you have slander'd so?

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Ignomy in ransom and free pardon

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Are of two houses: lawful mercy

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Is nothing kin to foul redemption.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: You seem'd of late to make the law a tyrant;

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: And rather proved the sliding of your brother

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: A merriment than a vice.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: O, pardon me, my lord; it oft falls out,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: To have what we would have, we speak not what we mean:

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: I something do excuse the thing I hate,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: For his advantage that I dearly love.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: We are all frail.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Else let my brother die,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: If not a feodary, but only he

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Owe and succeed thy weakness.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Nay, women are frail too.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Ay, as the glasses where they view themselves;

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Which are as easy broke as they make forms.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Women! Help Heaven! men their creation mar

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: In profiting by them. Nay, call us ten times frail;

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: For we are soft as our complexions are,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: And credulous to false prints.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: I think it well:

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: And from this testimony of your own sex,--

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Since I suppose we are made to be no stronger

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Than faults may shake our frames,--let me be bold;

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: I do arrest your words. Be that you are,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: That is, a woman; if you be more, you're none;

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: If you be one, as you are well express'd

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: By all external warrants, show it now,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: By putting on the destined livery.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: I have no tongue but one: gentle my lord,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Let me entreat you speak the former language.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Plainly conceive, I love you.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: My brother did love Juliet,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: And you tell me that he shall die for it.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: He shall not, Isabel, if you give me love.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: I know your virtue hath a licence in't,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Which seems a little fouler than it is,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: To pluck on others.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Believe me, on mine honour,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: My words express my purpose.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Ha! little honour to be much believed,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: And most pernicious purpose! Seeming, seeming!

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: I will proclaim thee, Angelo; look for't:

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Sign me a present pardon for my brother,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Or with an outstretch'd throat I'll tell the world aloud

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: What man thou art.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Who will believe thee, Isabel?

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: My unsoil'd name, the austereness of my life,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: My vouch against you, and my place i' the state,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Will so your accusation overweigh,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: That you shall stifle in your own report

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: And smell of calumny. I have begun,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: And now I give my sensual race the rein:

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Fit thy consent to my sharp appetite;

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Lay by all nicety and prolixious blushes,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: That banish what they sue for; redeem thy brother

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: By yielding up thy body to my will;

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Or else he must not only die the death,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: But thy unkindness shall his death draw out

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: To lingering sufferance. Answer me to-morrow,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Or, by the affection that now guides me most,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: I'll prove a tyrant to him. As for you,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ANGELO
line: Say what you can, my false o'erweighs your true.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: To whom should I complain? Did I tell this,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Who would believe me? O perilous mouths,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: That bear in them one and the self-same tongue,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Either of condemnation or approof;

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Bidding the law make court'sy to their will:

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Hooking both right and wrong to the appetite,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: To follow as it draws! I'll to my brother:

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Though he hath fallen by prompture of the blood,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Yet hath he in him such a mind of honour.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: That, had he twenty heads to tender down

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: On twenty bloody blocks, he'ld yield them up,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Before his sister should her body stoop

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: To such abhorr'd pollution.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Then, Isabel, live chaste, and, brother, die:

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: More than our brother is our chastity.

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: I'll tell him yet of Angelo's request,

scene: SCENE IV.  A room in ANGELO's house.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: And fit his mind to death, for his soul's rest.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: So then you hope of pardon from Lord Angelo?

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: CLAUDIO
line: The miserable have no other medicine

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: CLAUDIO
line: But only hope:

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: CLAUDIO
line: I've hope to live, and am prepared to die.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Be absolute for death; either death or life

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Shall thereby be the sweeter. Reason thus with life:

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: If I do lose thee, I do lose a thing

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: That none but fools would keep: a breath thou art,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Servile to all the skyey influences,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: That dost this habitation, where thou keep'st,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Hourly afflict: merely, thou art death's fool;

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: For him thou labour'st by thy flight to shun

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: And yet runn'st toward him still. Thou art not noble;

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: For all the accommodations that thou bear'st

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Are nursed by baseness. Thou'rt by no means valiant;

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: For thou dost fear the soft and tender fork

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Of a poor worm. Thy best of rest is sleep,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: And that thou oft provokest; yet grossly fear'st

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Thy death, which is no more. Thou art not thyself;

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: For thou exist'st on many a thousand grains

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: That issue out of dust. Happy thou art not;

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: For what thou hast not, still thou strivest to get,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: And what thou hast, forget'st. Thou art not certain;

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: For thy complexion shifts to strange effects,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: After the moon. If thou art rich, thou'rt poor;

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: For, like an ass whose back with ingots bows,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Thou bear's thy heavy riches but a journey,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: And death unloads thee. Friend hast thou none;

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: For thine own bowels, which do call thee sire,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: The mere effusion of thy proper loins,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Do curse the gout, serpigo, and the rheum,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: For ending thee no sooner. Thou hast nor youth nor age,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: But, as it were, an after-dinner's sleep,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Dreaming on both; for all thy blessed youth

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Becomes as aged, and doth beg the alms

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Of palsied eld; and when thou art old and rich,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Thou hast neither heat, affection, limb, nor beauty,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: To make thy riches pleasant. What's yet in this

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: That bears the name of life? Yet in this life

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Lie hid moe thousand deaths: yet death we fear,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: That makes these odds all even.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: CLAUDIO
line: I humbly thank you.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: CLAUDIO
line: To sue to live, I find I seek to die;

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: CLAUDIO
line: And, seeking death, find life: let it come on.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Within  What, ho! Peace here; grace and good company!

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: Provost
line: Who's there? come in: the wish deserves a welcome.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Dear sir, ere long I'll visit you again.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: CLAUDIO
line: Most holy sir, I thank you.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: My business is a word or two with Claudio.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: Provost
line: And very welcome. Look, signior, here's your sister.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Provost, a word with you.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: Provost
line: As many as you please.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: DUKE VINCENTIO
line: Bring me to hear them speak, where I may be concealed.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: CLAUDIO
line: Now, sister, what's the comfort?

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Why,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: As all comforts are; most good, most good indeed.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Lord Angelo, having affairs to heaven,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Intends you for his swift ambassador,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Where you shall be an everlasting leiger:

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Therefore your best appointment make with speed;

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: To-morrow you set on.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: CLAUDIO
line: Is there no remedy?

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: None, but such remedy as, to save a head,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: To cleave a heart in twain.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: CLAUDIO
line: But is there any?

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Yes, brother, you may live:

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: There is a devilish mercy in the judge,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: If you'll implore it, that will free your life,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: But fetter you till death.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: CLAUDIO
line: Perpetual durance?

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Ay, just; perpetual durance, a restraint,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Though all the world's vastidity you had,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: To a determined scope.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: CLAUDIO
line: But in what nature?

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: In such a one as, you consenting to't,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: Would bark your honour from that trunk you bear,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: And leave you naked.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: CLAUDIO
line: Let me know the point.

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
line: O, I do fear thee, Claudio; and I quake,

scene: SCENE I.  A room in the prison.
speaker: ISABELLA
